description:
Madison is on loan to the House. As Mistress Aiden's charge, she is to greet the men that come to Mistress. She is to conduct an orientation, the kind that charts pain tolerance and the responses of a man's prick.
When Mistress takes over, the newly trained fresh meat Madison's work begins. Keep that fucking cock hard while Mistress collects her due from this pathetic fucker's psyche, payable in the currency of pain.
title: The Sadist's Apprentice
